title: Item Lore Stats BUG
author: dddfly
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content: 请楼主提供插件版本，我用的707版本并无此bug

replies.author: dddfly
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content: <blockquote># Default config for ItemLoreStats.复制代码

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content:
dddfly 发表于 2016-8-16 10:22
607 你的707版本哪里下载的
打错我也是607..然而你这个问题我服务器中没有出现，如果不行的话我可以把我的配置发给你。

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content:
Mccraft-pepsi 发表于 2016-8-16 11:15
重新发一遍..# Default config for ItemLoreStats.

fileVersion: 607
serverVersion: 1710
checkForUpdates: false
languageFile: language-en
usingMcMMO: true
usingBarAPI: true
usingBossBarAPI: true
dropCustomILSLoot: false

addSellValueToDrops: false

keepXPOnDeath: true
addRandomLore: false
randomApplyChance: 0
baseHealth: 20
baseHealthRegen: 2
baseMovementSpeed: 0.2
baseCritDamage: 50
healthScale: 0
levelCap: 80

    - '&aCrafted with the finest materials of the land.'

    - '&9This lightweight {item} offers basic protection.'

    - '&cThis {item} offers very good protection.'
    - '&aThe {item} is strong.'
    - '&9This {item} has been forged by a decent blacksmith.'

    mobHead:
    - '&cDecapitated head.'
